name: Clidger
description:
Clidger is the clicker bullet hell !

Seems weird ? True. But you will see that the pixelised graphisms and the 16-bit music makes the game addictive ;)

The goal is to make the most points as possible ! To achieve that, you have to click on the ennemies to kill them and earn money. With this money, you will be able to buy upgrades for dealing more damage, getting more money or having auto-clickers !

But ennemies can shoot bullets which are letal for you. So you have to avoid them with the arrow keys.

And do not forget to share your best score in the comments below ;)

This game was submitted for the 41st edition of the Ludum Dare, in the compo category.

Hope you will enjoy the game and thank you for playing ! ;)
